name: Just My Size Womens Plus-Size Petite Pull-On Stretch Woven Pants
categoryPath: Clothing/Women's Plus/Women's Plus Bottoms/Women's Plus Pants

reviews.name: Just My Size Womens Plus-Size Petite Pull-On Stretch Woven Pants
reviews.reviewText: I ordered my usual size (22) but they were at least a size too big. I'll wear them because I don't want to pay the postage to exchange them.
reviews.title: Runs large

reviews.name: Just My Size Womens Plus-Size Petite Pull-On Stretch Woven Pants
reviews.reviewText: Finally, a petite that is really short enough. Nice material. Washes beautifully.
reviews.title: Good fit

reviews.name: Just My Size Womens Plus-Size Petite Pull-On Stretch Woven Pants
reviews.reviewText: I love how the pants fit, no struggling with putting them on. They are the best stretch pants ever, I would recommend them to all Walmart Customers. I just wish that I would have known about them years ago.
reviews.title: "Stretchy Wonder Pants"

reviews.name: Just My Size Womens Plus-Size Petite Pull-On Stretch Woven Pants
reviews.title: great value

reviews.name: Just My Size Womens Plus-Size Petite Pull-On Stretch Woven Pants
reviews.reviewText: Material seems to be okay. I buy on line because my Wal-Mart does not carry the style I need or like. This is my second order for jeans(not the same brand) and again the ad is misleading. Ad states elastic waistband and again the elastic is only in the back. I need all around elastic waistband. Again, I have to return my order. So disappointed in Wal-Mart. Don't their ad people know the difference between a full elastic waistband and a half waistband?? So, so disappointed. Definitely reconsidering buying clothes from Wal-Mart.
reviews.title: Ad is misleading
